"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5529f6326368727884ea0400#post_5529f6326368727884ea0400
People always imagine that if you lose gravity suddenly, you'd float up into space slowly.


In truth, you'd actually be flung into space at over a million kilometers an hour.
